message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value, I believe it's worth $950000 to secure this opportunity.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I think the product is worth slightly less than what you're asking. My counteroffer would be $850000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I must maintain the value of our product. My counteroffer is $900000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $875000.
I appreciate your consideration, Bob. After reviewing your proposal, I am willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $887500.
